src:
Terlalu Gila, Duel Chelsea vs Ajax Tidak Bisa Dijelaskan Frank Lampard
06 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Frank Lampard mengaku tidak bisa menjelaskan hasil imbang 4-4 yang diraih Chelsea saat menjamu Ajax Amsterdam, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Drama 8 gol sudah cukup menjelaskan betapa gilanya pertandingan itu.
Bertapa tidak, Chelsea dan Ajax sama-sama menyuguhkan permainan terbaik mereka pada duel matchday 4 Liga Champions 2019/20 itu. Pertandingan terus berkembang ke arah yang tak terduga, sampai akhirnya kedua tim harus puas berbagi poin.
Hasil ini memengaruhi klasemen sementara. Chelsea dan Ajax sama-sama mengoleksi 7 poin, juga Valencia. Artinya, persaingan masih terbuka lebar sampai pertandingan terakhir.
Bagaimanapun, Lampard mengaku tidak bisa menganalisis pertandingan gila tersebut. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Too Crazy, Chelsea vs Ajax Cannot Be Explained by Frank Lampard
Nov 6, 2019, 06:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Frank Lampard claimed not to be able to explain the 4-4 draw won by Chelsea when entertaining Ajax Amsterdam on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs. The 8 goal drama was enough to explain how crazy the match was.
Why not, Chelsea and Ajax both presented their best game in the 2019/20 Champions League matchday 4 duel. The game continued to develop in an unexpected direction, until finally both teams had to settle for sharing points.
This result affects the standings. Chelsea and Ajax are both collecting 7 points, also Valencia. That is, competition is still wide open until the last match.
However, Lampard claimed could not analyze the crazy match. Read below, Bolaneters!
